original_title: Armored Saint Symbol of Salvation Live in 2018
overview: There are many ways to celebrate the anniversary of an important release in a band's career, and for 'Symbol of Salvation's (1991) 30th birthday - an album vocalist John Bush refers to as Armored Saint's 'cornerstone record' - comes 'Symbol of Salvation: Live'.  In honour of the 30th anniversary of the band's fourth album the Saints' performed their hit 1991 album Symbol of Salvation live in it's entirety at New York's famed Gramercy Theatre during their 2018 tour. The performance captures the power, diversity and peerless songwriting contained within the album.
title: Armored Saint Symbol of Salvation Live in 2018
